means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 温特（温德） 绰号，性情冷淡者，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“冬季”(winter)
[人名] [爱尔兰姓氏] 温特（温德） 盖尔语姓氏的英译，含义是“冬季”(winter)

sentence.Network_en: If unused, winter radishes run to seed in spring.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果不去动的话，冬萝卜会在春天开花结籽。

sentence.Network_en: He has almost certainly blown his chance of touring India this winter.
sentence.Network_cn: 他几乎肯定失去了今冬去印度旅行的机会。

sentence.Network_en: Winter weather can leave you feeling fatigued and tired.
sentence.Network_cn: 冬季会让人感觉疲乏无力。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch winter and German Winter, probably also to wet

entry.def: Winter is the season between autumn and spring. In the winter the weather is usually cold.

example.ex: In winter the nights are long and cold.

entry.def: If an animal or plant winters somewhere or is wintered there, it spends the winter there.

example.ex: The birds will winter outside in an aviary...
example.tran: 鸟儿们将在外面的大鸟笼里过冬。

example.ex: The young seedlings are usually wintered in a cold frame.
example.tran: 幼苗通常都会放在冷床里越冬。

entry.def: If you winter somewhere, you spend the winter there.

example.ex: The family decided to winter in Nice again.
example.tran: 一家人决定还是到尼斯过冬。

means.word_mean: 1. the coldest season of the year; in the northern hemisphere it extends from the winter solstice to the vernal equinox

sentences.en: We used 10 tons of coal last winter.
sentences.cn: 去年冬天我们用了10吨煤。

jushi.english: We used 20 tons of coal last winter.
jushi.chinese: 去年冬天我们用了20吨煤。

jushi.english: Last winter we had a lot of snow.
jushi.chinese: 去年冬天,我们这里降雪很多。
那件事发生在许多年以前。
